text:
Created attachment 24201
Patches to change "apr_palloc / memcpy" to apr_pmemdup in APR

According to bug 39618
(https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=39518),
apr_palloc/memcpy should be changed to apr_pmemdup in some code from Apache
httpd.  Similar bugs are also identified in the APR project.  The patch changed
some apr_palloc/memcpy to apr_pmemdup in the APR project.
creator: boya.sun@case.edu
boya.sun@case.edu
text:
> According to bug 39618
should be bug 39518
